page.title: 19RELIGIONS
page.content: There are 7 places of worship all built within the last 50 years. There are{3 Methodist Churces}under one minister,{3 Anglican,}two of which are under 1 minister,and{1 Mormon Church.} A meeting hall for{Jehovah's Witnesses will open soon in Birchwood.Between 500 and 600 people regularly attend church.In the last year there have been 45 weddings,114 baptisms and 169 funerals in these churches. All the present churces have a hall which is used for such things as{youth {activities,Sunday schools and meetings {of Christian organisations.}The halls are also hired out for social activities such as wedding receptions, jumble sales,concerts and exhibitions. Only one of the churches remains open all the time otherwise they are locked when not in use because of the danger of vandalism.
